title: Executive Term Limits in Auth Regime

content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Develop an argument as to whether or not executive term limits can serve as effective checks on power in an authoritarian regime
Use one or more of the following course concepts to organize your response:
Political legitimacy
Accountability
Policy implementation
In your essay you must:
✓ Respond to the prompt with a defensible claim or thesis that establishes a line of reasoning using one or more of the course concepts.
✓ Support your claim with TWO pieces of specific and relevant evidence from one or more course countries. The evidence should be relevant to one or more of the course concepts.
